#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

int main()
{
    int n=1,m=1;
    int i, j;
    int count=1;


    while(1)
    {
        scanf("%d %d",&m,&n);
        if(m==0|| n==0)break;
        int matriz[m][n];
        char matriz_minas[m][n];

        memset(matriz, 0, sizeof(matriz));

        for ( i=0; i<m; i++ )scanf("%s",&matriz_minas[i]);

        for ( i=0; i<m; i++ )
            for ( j=0; j<n; j++ )
            {

                if(matriz_minas[i][j]=='*')
                {
                    int x,y;
                    for(x=i-1; x<i+2;x++)
                        for(y=j-1; y<j+2;y++)
                            if((x!=-1)&&(y!=-1)&&(x<m)&&(y<n))matriz[x][y]++;
                }
            }
        printf("Field #%d:\n",count);
        for ( i=0; i<m; i++ )
            for ( j=0; j<n; j++ )
            {
               if(matriz_minas[i][j]!='*') matriz_minas[i][j]=matriz[i][j]+0x30;
               printf("%c",matriz_minas[i][j]);
               if(j==n-1)puts("");
            }
    count++;
    }
    return 0;
}
